```{r}
power.method = function(A,v = NULL, epsilon, max_iter = 100, plot = FALSE){
  
  
  eigen_A = eigen(A)
  dominant = eigen_A$vectors[,which.max(abs(eigen_A$values))]
  
  b = rep(1, nrow(A))
  error = norm(dominant - b, type="2")
  
  b_old = b
  for(i in 1:N){
    b_new = A %*% b_old
    b_new = b_new/len(b_new)
    b_old = b_new
    
  }

  return(b_new)

}
```

```{r}
A = cbind(c(3,7), c(6,7))

eigen_A = eigen(A)
eigen_A
eigen_A$vectors[,which.max(abs(eigen_A$values))]
```
